title: Learned HTML
description: Learned HTML for the first time
highlights: Built super basic websites in Geocities, Angelfire, and Expage
Used it in an online chatroom to make my messages stand out

title: Started Learning PHP
description: Very basic PHP, but started my journey of learning how to code
highlights: Helped build and run a Starcraft League website that used vBulletin
Only really went in to edit code, but learned by doing
Not a lot of ressources at the time

title: First Paying Client
description: I had my first paying client as a sophomore in high school
highlights: $400 for a website for a construction company
Used it to by my first cell phone

title: Owner and Full Stack Web Developer
description: Founded and managed a successful freelance business
highlights: Developed e-commerce websites processing millions in annual transactions
Implemented secure online payment systems optimizing client resources
Led migration of 15,000-page Drupal website to WordPress in under six weeks
Managed all aspects of project management and software development

title: Full Stack Web Developer (Contractor)
description: Built many websites and spoke at conferences
highlights: Specialized in on-time project delivery and customer satisfaction
Focused on software deployment and web development
Met client-specific requirements and business objectives
Gave presentations at conferences on web design and development

title: Full Stack Developer
highlights: Started to code full-fledged web applications
Michigan Movers E-Tarriff Estimate System
Temp Job Agency Onboarding System
Moving Calculator

title: Full Stack Web Developer
description: Designed and implemented dynamic, responsive web interfaces
highlights: Built interfaces using JavaScript and React.js
Integrated front-end elements with server-side logic
Ensured seamless functionality across applications

title: Senior Full Stack Web Developer & Team Lead
description: Developed and maintained full-stack applications with multiple technologies
highlights: Enhanced user interfaces and back-end systems for responsive, user-friendly experiences
Analyzed customer interactions and business data to improve product functionality
Provided mentorship to junior developers and refined team development processes
Helped greatly with coming up with and building systems to manage our many websites at scale

title: Software Architect & Multi-Team Lead
description: Lead architect focused on optimizing software performance and AI initiatives
highlights: Spearheaded key AI initiatives including Chatbot, Automated Call Transcript,
AI Funnel Analyzer, and Dynamic Service Areas
Implemented basic Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems to support dynamic
content generation and funnel analysis
Working closely with Stakeholders and Developers and everyone in between
Team Lead roll across multiple teams
